recipeInstructions.text: Grease and flour four mini loaf pans and preheat oven to 350F.
Add the sugar and butter to a mixing bowl and beat them with an electric mixer until well combined. Add eggs, pumpkin and vanilla and mix.
In a separate bowl mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg.
Add half of the flour mixture to pumpkin mixture, then add milk, then remaining flour mixture. Fold in chocolate chips at the end.
Pour the batter into pans. Bake at 350F for 35-45 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean. Check every 5 minutes after 35 min.
Cool for a few minutes in the pan before inverting onto a wire rack to cool.
